item.title: Tesla’s Earnings Review: Does the Juice Justify the Squeeze?
item.description: Tesla’s Q3 report looks to have landed a little soft versus what was needed. Shares fell after-hours, and the risk/reward profile has taken a hit.

item.title: Is Oracle’s AI Rally Over? Wall Street Thinks ORCL Could Hit $400
item.description: Oracle’s $300 billion deal with OpenAI has reignited the stock, and even with the recent pullback, analysts still see up to 45% in additional upside.

item.title: Breakout Momentum Plays You Need to Know About
